languages.text: "Давайте объясню. Вы изъяли десятину, где-то раздобыв визы маршала и Администратума, после чего с вами связался сообщник и, каким-то образом обманув духов машин, активировал уничтожение мира с помощью циклонных бомб. Циклонных бомб, поставленных годы назад с одного из миров фон Валанциус, хочу заметить. Осталось лишь скрыться и замести следы. Ничего не упустила?"

"Allow me to explain: you seized the tithe by somehow obtaining both the Marshal's and the Administratum's authorisations. Then, an accomplice contacted you and tricked the machine spirits into activating the destruction of the world with cyclonic bombs — bombs delivered years ago from a von Valancius world, I should add. All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"
languages.original_text: "Давайте объясню. Вы изъяли десятину, где-то раздобыв визы маршала и Администратума, после чего с вами связался сообщник и, каким-то образом обманув духов машин, активировал уничтожение мира с помощью циклонных бомб. Циклонных бомб, поставленных годы назад с одного из миров фон Валанциус, хочу заметить. Осталось лишь скрыться и замести следы. Ничего не упустила?"

traits.locale_text: "Let me explain. You seised the tithe by somehow obtaining the Marshal's and Administratum's visas, then an accomplice contacted you and bamboozled the machine spirits into activating the destruction of the world with cyclonic bombs. The bombs delivered years ago from a von Valancius world, I should add. All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"

All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"

languages.text: «Deje que se lo explique: se ha hecho con el diezmo obteniendo de alguna forma la autorización del Mariscal y del Administratum. Después, un cómplice contactó con usted y engañó a los espíritus máquina para que activaran la destrucción del mundo mediante bombas ciclónicas que, por cierto, se enviaron hace años desde un mundo von Valancius, nada menos. Solo le queda marcharse y borrar sus huellas. ¿Me he saltado algo?».
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: you seized the tithe by somehow obtaining both the Marshal's and the Administratum's authorisations. Then, an accomplice contacted you and tricked the machine spirits into activating the destruction of the world with cyclonic bombs — bombs delivered years ago from a von Valancius world, I should add. All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"

traits.locale_text: «Deje que se lo explique: se ha hecho con el diezmo obteniendo de alguna forma la autorización del Mariscal y del Administratum. Después, un cómplice contactó con usted y engañó a los espíritus máquina para que activaran la destrucción del mundo mediante bombas ciclónicas que, por cierto, se enviaron hace años desde un mundo von Valancius, nada menos. Solo le queda marcharse y borrar sus huellas. ¿Me he saltado algo?».

languages.text: “既然如此，请允许我来解释一下吧。你通过某种手段，得到了元帅与内政部的授权，获得了什一税。之后，你的同伙与你取得了联系，欺骗了机魂，让机魂启动旋风炸弹，意欲毁灭这颗行星。对了，我还得补充一句，这些炸弹是几年前从冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的领地运过来的。接下来你打算一走了之，彻底掩盖你的踪迹。我有哪里说错了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: you seized the tithe by somehow obtaining both the Marshal's and the Administratum's authorisations. Then, an accomplice contacted you and tricked the machine spirits into activating the destruction of the world with cyclonic bombs — bombs delivered years ago from a von Valancius world, I should add. All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，请允许我来解释一下吧。你通过某种手段，得到了元帅与内政部的授权，获得了什一税。之后，你的同伙与你取得了联系，欺骗了机魂，让机魂启动旋风炸弹，意欲毁灭这颗行星。对了，我还得补充一句，这些炸弹是几年前从冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的领地运过来的。接下来你打算一走了之，彻底掩盖你的踪迹。我有哪里说错了吗？”

languages.text: 「言い訳になりますが、あなたはどういうわけか将帥と行政局の承認の両方を得て、租税を奪いました。そして、共犯者があなたに接触し、機械精霊をだまして、サイクロン爆弾で惑星を破壊させようとしています。その爆弾は、フォン・ヴァランシウス惑星から何年も前に送られたものであることも付け加えておきます。残るは脱出して痕跡を隠すことだけです。違いますか？」
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: you seized the tithe by somehow obtaining both the Marshal's and the Administratum's authorisations. Then, an accomplice contacted you and tricked the machine spirits into activating the destruction of the world with cyclonic bombs — bombs delivered years ago from a von Valancius world, I should add. All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"

traits.locale_text: 「言い訳になりますが、あなたはどういうわけか将帥と行政局の承認の両方を得て、租税を奪いました。そして、共犯者があなたに接触し、機械精霊をだまして、サイクロン爆弾で惑星を破壊させようとしています。その爆弾は、フォン・ヴァランシウス惑星から何年も前に送られたものであることも付け加えておきます。残るは脱出して痕跡を隠すことだけです。違いますか？」

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, souffrez que j'éclaire votre lanterne : vous avez détourné la dîme après avoir circonvenu d'une manière ou d'une autre le maréchal et l'Administratum. Ensuite, un complice vous a {mf|contacté|contactée} et a convaincu les esprits de la machine d'activer des bombes cycloniques afin de pulvériser la planète... des bombes qui, rappelons-le, ont été acheminées jusqu'ici il y a de nombreuses années depuis un monde appartenant aux von Valancius. Tout ce qu'il vous reste à faire à présent, c'est de disparaître après avoir dissimulé vos traces. C'est bien cela ? »
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: you seized the tithe by somehow obtaining both the Marshal's and the Administratum's authorisations. Then, an accomplice contacted you and tricked the machine spirits into activating the destruction of the world with cyclonic bombs — bombs delivered years ago from a von Valancius world, I should add. All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, souffrez que j'éclaire votre lanterne : vous avez détourné la dîme après avoir circonvenu d'une manière ou d'une autre le maréchal et l'Administratum. Ensuite, un complice vous a {mf|contacté|contactée} et a convaincu les esprits de la machine d'activer des bombes cycloniques afin de pulvériser la planète... des bombes qui, rappelons-le, ont été acheminées jusqu'ici il y a de nombreuses années depuis un monde appartenant aux von Valancius. Tout ce qu'il vous reste à faire à présent, c'est de disparaître après avoir dissimulé vos traces. C'est bien cela ? »

languages.text: "İzah edeyim: Bir şekilde hem Miralay'ın hem de Administratum'un izniyle aşarı eline geçirdin. Sonra suç ortağın seninle temasa geçti ve makine ruhlarını kandırıp gezegenin siklonik bombalarla yok edilmesi sürecini başlattı. Bu bombaların yıllar önce bir von Valancius dünyasından getirildiğini de belirteyim. Geriye sadece sıvışmak ve izlerini örtmek kaldı. Atladığım bir yer var mı?"
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: you seized the tithe by somehow obtaining both the Marshal's and the Administratum's authorisations. Then, an accomplice contacted you and tricked the machine spirits into activating the destruction of the world with cyclonic bombs — bombs delivered years ago from a von Valancius world, I should add. All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"

traits.locale_text: "İzah edeyim: Bir şekilde hem Miralay'ın hem de Administratum'un izniyle aşarı eline geçirdin. Sonra suç ortağın seninle temasa geçti ve makine ruhlarını kandırıp gezegenin siklonik bombalarla yok edilmesi sürecini başlattı. Bu bombaların yıllar önce bir von Valancius dünyasından getirildiğini de belirteyim. Geriye sadece sıvışmak ve izlerini örtmek kaldı. Atladığım bir yer var mı?"

languages.text: "Dann will ich es Euch erklären: Ihr habt Euch den Zehnt unter den Nagel gerissen, indem Ihr Euch irgendwie die Autorisierung des Marschalls und des Administratums erschlichen habt. Dann hat Euch ein Komplize kontaktiert und die Maschinengeister mit einer List dazu gebracht, die Zerstörung der Welt mit zyklonischen Bomben einzuleiten ... Bomben, die vor Jahren von einer Welt derer von Valancius geliefert wurden, wie ich hinzufügen möchte. Ihr müsst jetzt nur noch verschwinden und Eure Spuren verwischen. Habe ich etwas vergessen?"
languages.original_text: "Allow me to explain: you seized the tithe by somehow obtaining both the Marshal's and the Administratum's authorisations. Then, an accomplice contacted you and tricked the machine spirits into activating the destruction of the world with cyclonic bombs — bombs delivered years ago from a von Valancius world, I should add. All that is left to do is get away and cover your tracks. Did I miss anything?"
